page.description: Determine if a specific UserValue is locked out. Returns blank if UserValue not locked out, and returns 'locked out until time' as character if locked out.
page.syntax: Result as C = a5ws_LockOutUserStatus(C UserValue [,* NotUsed ])

argument.name: Result
argument.description: Returns blank value if 'UserValue' is not locked out or lock out time has expired. Will return 'locked out until' time as character value if user is locked out.

argument.name: UserValue
argument.description: A user value to be checked.

page.discussion: The A5WS_LockOutUserStatus() function determines the locked out status of a user value.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example shows that the user "joe@email.com" is locked out until Jan 1, 2007 at 10:00 pm.

see.ref: Determines the locked out status of a user value
